cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 145 miles SE of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn northwest then north-northwest, skirting the Florida Keys Sunday morning, moving up the Florida west coast and then inland across Georgia and Alabama

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch in place from west of Indian Pass FL to the Okaloosa/Walton Co. line and north of Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for the entire Florida Keys and Florida peninsula south of the Aucilla River; Storm Surge Warning from Volusia/Brevard County line southward around the peninsula to Suwannee River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys, entire Florida peninsula, and coastal Georgia/South Carolina later in the period
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible with occasional gusts below tropical-storm force early next week
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at the Mississippi coast according to current surge watch/warning areas
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands of rain could bring 2â€“4 inches Monday night through Wednesday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents along the Mississippi and Alabama coasts
